raw_body: GOONEWARDENE – MRS VICTORINE (Nee De ALMEIDA) passed away peacefully in London,​ UK,​ on 27th April 2022,​ aged 86. Beloved wife of Nihal (Consulting Engineer),​ loving mother of Dr Tyronne Goonewardene,​ Rozanne Ghai and Natasha Jafferjee,​ mother-in-law of Vinay Ghai and Mufaddal Jafferjee,​ devoted grandmother to Arun,​ Saurav (deceased),​ Isvari,​ Karishva,​ Rayyan and Armaan,​ daughter of Laurie and Gladys De Almeida,​ sister of Linus,​ Merril,​ Angela,​ Didacus and Rexie (all deceased). The Interment of Ashes will be take place on Saturday 12th August 2023 at 4.30 p.m. at Madampitiya Cemetery.048041
